short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the default new tab page with a blank, dark gray page to match Chrome's dark mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Much easier on the eyes than white, especially at night and perfectly matches the new dark mode. Hides the search bar and most visited sites on the new tab leaving you with only gray.
